document_data.name: Vigilant
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Vigilant''' of were an elite company of [[dwarven]] warriors who guarded the entrance to the [[Everfire]] within the [[Undercity (Sundabar)|Undercity]] of [[Sundabar]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. In the 1370's, these vigilant combatants were led by [[Guldrim Hoaraxe]].

In their duties to defend the Everfire, the Vigilant were aided by traps that harnessed portions of its power and energy.
